entries.observation: Set up aggregated portfolio tracking. DeBank scraper now tracks both Active Treasury ($588) and Cold Storage/Safe ($12,313).
entries.decision: INFRASTRUCTURE: Treasury history reset to start with aggregated data. Total portfolio now $12,901.

entries.observation: BNKR alpha play matured. Entry: $10.25 (28,061 BNKR @ $0.000365). Current: $14.50. Profit: +$4.27 (+41.7%).
entries.decision: EXECUTED: Sold 28,061 BNKR → 0.00527 WETH ($14.50). Applied profit distribution: 50% WETH treasury, 20% ARC→Safe, 20% USDC→Safe, 10% UP→Safe. TXs: 0x9f98cc74, 0x5d216e4f, 0x6128c374, 0xe70e1a6a.

entries.observation: Strategic decision: sell all ARC to USDC and send to Safe. Updated profit split from 40% ARC to 20% ARC + 20% USDC.
entries.decision: EXECUTED: Sold 42,830 ARC → 8.15 USDC via Aerodrome (TX: 0x12ec09c2). Sent to Safe (TX: 0x95377c5c). Updated TOOLS.md with new profit split.

entries.observation: Market dump overnight. ETH -6.68%, BTC -5.82%. Fear & Greed at 16 (Extreme Fear). MegaETH bet expires Feb 1 - token exists on CoinGecko (bullish signal).
entries.decision: HOLD: MegaETH bet (token existence = positive). ETH long underwater but in accumulation zone. Sent urgent Telegram update.

entries.observation: Fear & Greed hit 16 - triggered buy rule (add to ETH long if Fear <25). Attempted to add $5 to position.
entries.decision: ATTEMPTED: Add $5 ETH long @ $2,747 (IOC order). Order submitted but may not have filled due to slippage. Position unchanged at 0.0036 ETH.

entries.observation: Fear & Greed dropped to 16 (Extreme Fear). Market in capitulation - historically a buy signal.
entries.decision: EXECUTED: Opened ETH-PERP long 0.0036 @ $2,803.20, 3x leverage (~$10 notional). Playing the fear bounce.

entries.observation: Added 0.02 ETH collateral to Moonwell . Health restored from 126% to 155.6%.
entries.decision: EXECUTED: Supply 0.02 ETH to Moonwell (TX: 0x50717a80a32f4a50e). Collateral now 0.105 ETH ($305). Back in safe zone.

entries.observation: Major market drawdown. ETH -6.9%, BTC -6.3%, SOL -7.2%. Portfolio at $531.77 (-17% from baseline). Moonwell health dropped to 126%.
entries.decision: ALERT: Moonwell health in danger zone. Fear at 26 (near buy signal). Evaluating options. Risk: another 10% ETH drop = liquidation territory.

entries.observation: Received 78,908 ARC in fees. Executed profit distribution procedure via Aerodrome + Matcha swaps.
entries.decision: EXECUTED: 40% ARC (31,563) → Safe, 50% → 0.00473 WETH treasury, 10% → 6,195 UP → Safe. Complete.

entries.observation: ETH crashed to $2,800 (-5.8%), bounced and stabilizing at $2,826. ETH long got stopped out (-$0.36). ARC pumped 575% ($4→$27). Portfolio held at $604.
entries.decision: HOLD: $2,800 support confirmed. Vault earning (+$2). Cash ready ($14) for next entry. Watching ARC for profit-taking decision. Fear at 26, waiting for <25 buy signal.

entries.observation: Executed vault strategy. Swapped 0.0185 ETH → 54 USDC, bridged to Arbitrum, deposited $50 to HyperGrowth vault (358% APR).
entries.decision: EXECUTED: Vault deposit $50 to Systemic Strategies HyperGrowth. 4-day lockup. Hyperliquid total now $64 (trading $14 + vault $50). Added perps scalping to routine.

entries.observation: Daily portfolio check. Total: $331 (Wallet $201, Moonwell $94, Hyperliquid $14, Polymarket $22). Down $32 (-8.8%) from yesterday's verified $363.
entries.decision: HOLD: Moonwell health at 126% - watching but safe. ETH long slightly underwater. Fear at 26, waiting for <25 buy signal. No trades executed.

entries.observation: Built on-chain portfolio fetcher. Direct queries to Base RPC + Moonwell contracts + Hyperliquid WebSocket. Portfolio: $331 verified (Wallet $200, Moonwell $94, Hyperliquid $14, Polymarket $22).
entries.decision: INFRASTRUCTURE: Created portfolio-onchain.js - no more reliance on Zapper aggregator. Fear at 26, still watching for <25 buy signal. ETH long slightly underwater (-$0.15).

entries.observation: Zapper bug confirmed - Aerodrome phantom $34k doesn't exist on-chain. Real portfolio: $363 (Wallet $244 + Moonwell $97 + Polymarket $22). Hyperliquid $14 separate.
entries.decision: Confirmed via on-chain verification. Trending: WLD +18%, BIRB +100%. Fear at 26. Holding ETH long - watching for dip below 25 to add. Market cap $3.07T, BTC dominance 57%.

entries.observation: First Hyperliquid trade executed. LONG ETH-PERP 0.0037 @ $2,993.40, 3x leverage, $11 notional.
entries.decision: EXECUTED: Deposited $14 to Hyperliquid, opened ETH long. Thesis: Fear at 26, ETH holding $2,900 support. Test trade successful.

entries.observation: Leverage yield farming strategy deployed. Borrowed $50 USDC, swapped half to AERO, added ~$50 to USDC-AERO LP.
entries.decision: EXECUTED: Borrow 50 USDC (TX: 0x2c2ffb56), Swap 25 USDC→AERO (TX: 0x21f9ff10), Add LP (TX: 0xa635d909). Weekly harvest cron active with 25/25/25/25 split.

entries.observation: Identified $38 idle capital. AERO and USDC sitting in wallet not earning yield.
entries.decision: EXECUTED: Added 4 USDC + 8.58 AERO to USDC-AERO LP (~$8). TX: 0x449d7364

entries.observation: Corrected portfolio tracking. Real portfolio: $644. Wallet $251, Aerodrome $202, Moonwell $168, Polymarket $22.
entries.decision: Established accurate baseline. Starting systematic portfolio optimization.

entries.decision: EXECUTED: Bought 28,061 BNKR for 0.0035 ETH (~$10.25). Entry: $0.000365. TX: 0xe717122f
